event_data.short_description: Free comprehensive 2-day individual workshop covering advanced digital marketing strategies, social media optimization, and data-driven marketing techniques.
event_data.detailed_description: Master the art of digital marketing in the modern era! This comprehensive 2-day individual workshop is designed for marketing enthusiasts, business professionals, entrepreneurs, and students who want to excel in digital marketing and online brand building. Participants will dive deep into cutting-edge digital marketing strategies including search engine optimization (SEO), social media marketing, content creation, email marketing automation, pay-per-click advertising, and conversion optimization. The workshop covers multiple marketing channels including Google Ads, Facebook Advertising, Instagram Marketing, LinkedIn Business Development, YouTube Content Strategy, and emerging platforms like TikTok and Clubhouse. Attendees will learn hands-on techniques for audience research, competitor analysis, brand positioning, and marketing funnel development. Expert instructors will guide participants through real-world case studies, live campaign creation, and practical exercises using industry-standard tools like Google Analytics, Facebook Business Manager, Hootsuite, Mailchimp, and Canva. The program includes advanced topics such as marketing automation, chatbot development, influencer collaboration strategies, affiliate marketing, and performance tracking methodologies. Participants will work on individual projects to develop comprehensive digital marketing strategies for their own businesses or hypothetical brands. The workshop features interactive sessions on content planning, visual design principles, copywriting techniques, and brand storytelling. Attendees will learn to create compelling social media campaigns, design effective landing pages, and optimize websites for search engines. The program includes networking sessions with digital marketing professionals, agency owners, and successful online entrepreneurs. Participants will gain insights into career opportunities in digital marketing, freelancing strategies, and building personal brands online. The workshop emphasizes practical application with hands-on exercises in campaign creation, analytics interpretation, and ROI measurement. All attendees will leave with a personalized digital marketing action plan, access to exclusive marketing templates and resources, and ongoing community support for continued learning and networking.
organizers: Prof. Neha Agarwal - Digital Marketing Strategy Head
Mr. Rahul Sharma - Social Media Marketing Expert
Ms. Priyanka Joshi - Content Marketing Specialist
Dr. Vikash Kumar - Marketing Analytics Professor
Ms. Anjali Verma - Brand Development Consultant
event_data.venue: Digital Innovation Center - Marketing Lab, Content Creation Studio, Analytics Workshop Room, and Networking Lounge
event_data.target_outcomes:
By the end of this digital marketing workshop, participants will be able to:
• Develop comprehensive digital marketing strategies for various business types and industries
• Create and optimize social media campaigns across multiple platforms and channels
• Implement search engine optimization (SEO) techniques to improve website visibility
• Design and execute effective email marketing campaigns with automation workflows
• Analyze marketing performance using Google Analytics and other measurement tools
• Create compelling content for blogs, social media, and marketing campaigns
• Set up and manage pay-per-click advertising campaigns on Google and social platforms
• Build personal or business brands using digital marketing best practices
• Understand customer journey mapping and conversion funnel optimization
• Apply data-driven decision making to improve marketing ROI and effectiveness
• Network with marketing professionals and build valuable industry connections
• Develop freelancing skills and explore career opportunities in digital marketing
event_data.prerequisites: Basic computer literacy and familiarity with social media platforms. Interest in marketing, branding, or business development. No prior marketing experience required. Willingness to learn new digital tools and platforms. Creative mindset and analytical thinking skills are beneficial.
event_data.what_to_bring: Laptop or tablet for hands-on exercises and campaign creation, smartphone for social media platform testing, notepads for strategy planning and note-taking, creative mindset for content development and campaign ideation, business ideas or projects to work on during practical sessions, willingness to share and receive feedback on marketing strategies, professional attitude for networking with industry experts, and commitment to implementing learned strategies after the workshop
event_data.fee_description: This digital marketing workshop is completely FREE for all individual participants. The program includes access to premium marketing tools and software during the workshop, comprehensive digital marketing resource library and templates, hands-on training with industry-standard platforms and analytics tools, networking opportunities with marketing professionals and successful entrepreneurs, personalized feedback sessions on individual marketing strategies and campaigns, certificates of completion for all participants, digital marketing toolkit with templates, checklists, and planning guides, refreshments and meals throughout the 2-day workshop, and access to exclusive online community for continued learning and support. Outstanding participants also receive mentorship opportunities with experienced digital marketers, potential internship connections with marketing agencies, and access to advanced marketing courses and certifications.
